metadata.description: Claude Code plugins by MasterMind-SL â€” productivity tools, freelance automation, and multi-agent systems

plugins.name: upwork-scraper
plugins.description: Scrape Upwork jobs, analyze market demand, write proposals, evaluate postings, optimize rates, review profiles, and design portfolio projects. Includes 5 slash commands and 5 specialized AI agents.

plugins.name: the-council
plugins.description: Adversarial consultation with persistent memory for Claude Code agent teams. 4 auto-routed modes, configurable roles, /council:build pipeline (PRD + tech deck + backlog + feature gate + implementation), anti-deferral system, and intelligent memory retrieval with synonym expansion, staleness markers, and MEMORY LENS directives.

plugins.name: computer-vision
plugins.description: Desktop computer vision and input control for Claude Code on Windows. 16 tools: screenshots, click, type, OCR with bounding boxes, natural language element finder (cv_find), text extraction (cv_get_text), UI accessibility trees. Like Claude-in-Chrome, but for any Windows app.
